title: Wireless headphones keep muting when trying to unlock phone?
content:
Whenever I am listening to music via bluetooth headphones and I try to unlock my phone (either manually or face unlock), my headphones automatically mute (music continues to play while muted). Afterwards I have to un-mute my headphones.

Never had this problem before until recently when I decided to use my bluetooth headphones again.

Any thoughts?
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 4 XL
